author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add 4 scenarios with modified tracker material budgets (changed by +-5%  or +-10%) for the Run3 scenario

#### PR validation:

Tested using a cfg file in Geometry/CMSCommonData/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex40 Add scenarios with modified tracker material budgets for the Run3 scenario
